results.title: Moulamain dreaming
results.brief_description: Naomi Edwards lives in Mildura but dreams of going back to Moulamain to live with her grandparents and mum and dad. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Mouchette
results.creator_credit: Robert Bresson, Anatole Dauman, Parc Film and Argos Films
results.brief_description: Based on the Georges Bernanos novel “Nouvelle histiore de Mouchette”, Robert Bresson’s unflinching tale of poverty and cruelty is an agonising and unsentimental film experience. Mouchette (Nadine Nortier) is a 14 year old peasant school girl. Her mother is dying and her father is a brutal alcoholic, leaving her to fend for herself and her baby brother amidst a harsh and indifferent community. When local poacher Arsene (Jean-Claude Guilbert) turns to Mouchette for an alibi over a possible murder, the young girl desperately responds to his neediness, unaware that she is being used yet again. Bresson strips scenes, performances and emotions down to their bare necessities, creating a unique style which at first might seem alienating but ultimately depicts the human experience with mystery, grace and poignancy. In French with English subtitles. Cast also includes Maria Cardinal, Paul Herbert, Jean Vimenet (Awards: Best film 1967 Venice Film festival)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Bresson, Anatole Dauman, Parc Film and Argos Films

results.title: Mots' Mansion [videogame trailer]
results.brief_description: Special Mention in the Middle Videogame category. Sam, Bec and their Mother move in to Grandma’s house. But when Bec is captured, Sam needs to complete tasks given to him by the mysterious MOTS. Can he trust the Man on the Stairs and will they both make it out. In the end, the choices you make will matter.

results.title: Motown 25: Yesterday, Today, Forever
results.brief_description: Hosted by Richard Pryor, this is a fast paced, all star reunion that spotlights performances by the biggest acts ever to come out of Detroit including vintage footage of the groups from the sixties and seventies. It looks behind the scenes into what made Motown tick, the songwriters who helped bring the Motown sound to fame and the man who started it all, the legendary Berry Gordy. Rated: G

results.title: Motorcycle safety tips
results.brief_description: Points out the special problems motorcycle riders have and how motorists, cyclists and pedestrians can cooperate for the safety of all. It is aimed at both the beginner and the experienced rider. Discusses how to check out a bike for safety, how to dress, defensive driving, how to develop driving skills, and how to increase awareness and thereby chances of survival. Suitable for upper secondary level.
